title: Mechanics of Materials: An Introduction to Engineering Technolog
description:
Title: Mechanics of Materials: An Introduction to Engineering Technology 
Author: Parviz Ghavami 
Format: PDF 
Hardcover: 249 pages 
Publisher: Springer; 2015 edition (December 11, 2014) 
Language: English 
ISBN: 9783319075716 


This book, framed in the processes of engineering analysis and design, presents concepts in mechanics of materials for students in two-year or four-year programs in engineering technology, architecture, and building construction; as well as for students in vocational schools and technical institutes. Using the principles and laws of mechanics, physics, and the fundamentals of engineering, Mechanics of Materials: An Introduction for Engineering Technology will help aspiring and practicing engineers and engineering technicians from across disciplinesâ€•mechanical, civil, chemical, and electricalâ€•apply concepts of engineering mechanics for analysis and design of materials, structures, and machine components. The book is ideal for those seeking a rigorous, algebra/trigonometry-based text on the mechanics of materials
